: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus gives serious thought to the given names. He liked the historic idea. Rodimus decided against Arcee. He wouldn't feel comfortable, considering his past relationship with Arcee. Elita was good though. Elita-1 was a great warrior and leader to the female Autobots. Very noble, and tough, yet sweet at the same time. That would be the name.
Rodimus Prime: I like Elita. That name carries some good merits with it.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight::

"I don't sure... "Said Nightlight "I was thinking some historic 
names as Elita or Arcee... Or one original instead... what do you 
think?"

Very noble, and tough, yet sweet at the same time. That would be the name.
